metadata.name: Google Workspace Role Privilege Deleted
metadata.comment: Detects when an a role privilege is deleted in Google Workspace.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM entity_management WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('4') AND lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('admin.googleapis.com') AND lower(api.operation) = lower('remove_privilege'))

output.summary: Detects when an a role privilege is deleted in Google Workspace.
